author: Thomas Franck
title: Paul Tudor Jones says stocks could retest lows as virus peaks, but will be higher in 3 to 5 months
description: Paul Tudor Jones thinks the market could be higher as soon as three months from now despite expectations for a turbulent April.
content:
This is breaking news. Please check back for updates.
Hedge fund manager Paul Tudor Jones, founder of Tudor Investment and JUST Capital, thinks the market could be higher as soon as three months from now despite what he sees as a turbulent month ahead.
